subject: Slash: /plans panel Esc/q returns to Projects panel
description:
Repro (tmux, repo root):
1) Run /plans from main input (not from /projects panel).
2) Plans panel opens ("Plans for <project>").
3) Press Esc or q.

Actual: Plans panel closes and Projects panel opens (Projects list).
Expected: /plans behaves like /tasks or /projects and returns to main input when closed. If /plans is opened directly, Esc/q should not jump to Projects unless explicitly requested.
